name: Clay Skin
components: V, S, M (clay and iron fillings)
text: The target’s skin becomes as thick and tough as clay, granting the target DR 5/adamantine. Once the spell has prevented a total of 5 points of damage per caster level (maximum 50 points), it is discharged and the spell ends.
components_zh: 语言，姿势,材料（黏土和碎铁屑）
duration_zh: 10分钟/等级 或 直至能量发散
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 目标的皮肤会变得坚韧并且摸起来就像黏土一样，给予了目标DR5/精金。一旦这个法术转换了每施法者等级5点伤害 (最高50)，法术能量耗尽。
